Package ex2

package ex2
  • Class
    Description
    Controller
    Controller class manages the process of reading URLs from a file, initiating download tasks with a thread pool, and handling output formats.
    Downloader
    Downloader is an abstract class for downloading content from URLs.
    FileReaderComp
    FileReaderComp is a class that reads content from a specified file.
    FormatFactory
    FormatFactory is a factory class for creating output formats.
    FormatType
    FormatType represents the various types of output formats.
    ImageDownloader
    ImageDownloader is a subclass of Downloader for downloading image content.
    ImagTypeFormat
    ImagTypeFormat is a class that extracts the image type from the HTTP response.
    Main
    Main class for executing the program.
    OutFormat
    OutFormat defines the contract for output formatting classes.
    Read
    The `Read` interface defines a contract for reading content from a source.
    SizeFormat
    SizeFormat is a class that retrieves the content length from an HTTP response.
    TimeFormat
    TimeFormat measures the time taken for an HTTP response.
    UrlFormat
    UrlFormat is a class that extracts the URL from an HTTP response.
